name: Miles without Stiles: Hawkshead to Loanthwaite Lane

ai.summary: A short, easy 1.7 km route in the UK from Hawkshead to Loanthwaite Lane, designed for accessibility and a relaxed walking experience. Suitable for beginners, families, and anyone seeking a barrier-light stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly smooth, level paths along rural lanes. Surface is typically compacted earth or gravel; may include short sections of grassy verge. The route is marketed as a Miles without Stiles style walk, but verify access on the day.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Use public rights of way and respect private property. Be aware of traffic on lanes, check for livestock, and carry a map or GPS. The distance is 1.7 km, so plan for a short outing with hydration.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.
